useCase.name: Manage Fault Management Job and Report

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Job enters the 'inProgress' state.
Fault Management Report is created due to the Job.
Fault Management Report enters the 'inProgress' state.
Fault Management Report completes the data collection.
Fault Management Job receives the completed report.
Fault Management Job enters the 'completed' state.
Buyer/Client requests the Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Report content is provided to the Buyer/Client.
